p: Additionally, the genetic analysis of FV-PTC lesions showed increased RAS mutations rather than B-type Raf kinase (BRAF) and rearranged in transformation/papillary thyroid carcinoma (RET/PTC) rearrangements, which have been linked with classic PTC [2], [5], [7]. The RAS mutations have also been described in follicular lesions of the thyroid gland such as follicular adenoma and follicular thyroid carcinoma.
